repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This is a manuscript of Adhikaraṇasārāvalī, which is a Vedāntika text. Each chapter is divided into various sections. Although V Raghavan has indicated that the manuscript comprises the first four chapters of the book, the end of the document must be determined. First two folio are missing. Because few folios at the end are not numbered in order, the last folio is numbered as x. Two lines on xv are written in the reverse direction, it seems to be some marginal addition or explanation.

msItem.title: Adhikaraṇasārāvalī. Adhyāya 1-4
msItem.author: Veṅkaṭanātha Vedāntācārya

filiation.p: New Catalogus Catalogorum vol 01 pp:110-111 VOHD II,8: entry. 3438

msItem.incipit: 3v 1 sautrīsaṃkhyā śubhāśiradhikṛtigaṇanā cinmayī brahmakarḍeṭ tādarthye anantaratvepyadhikaraṇabhidānālpasāraiḥ prakalpyā .. .. 3v 2 akṣormyāśāhikāṣṭhādviradamunivasūrmyadritattvātiśakvarya kṣairakṣaiḥ prayājairiha bhavati rasaiḥ pādanītiprabandhaḥ . 16..
msItem.explicit: xv 8 dīndemāhakṣobhadīnāt dīnakarakiraṇaśreṇī ke cojjīṇānānvidyā hṛdyā valiyaṃ sṛdayamayīgatā bhāvyāt dhīnotu .. … 3.

support.p: Thin palm leaf is used as cover. It has only front guard cover.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numeration in the left margin on the verso of the folio but not continues.

handNote.desc: Hand writing readable but at some places clusters are not clear.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin of folio xv.

listBibl.bibl: śrīvedāntācāryaviracitā adhikaraṇasārāvalī iyaṃ ca śrīśailādaṅki lakṣmīnarasīmhakuṃāratātārya kavibhūṣaṇasvāmibhiḥ pratyavekṣitāṃ A Vi Narasiṃhācāryaiḥ Ti Ve Ci Narasiṃhācāryaiśca, pariśodhitā 1909 tamavarṣe mudritāmanusṛtya 1936 R Veṅkaṭeśvarakampanyādhikāribhiḥ ānandamudrayantrālaye dvitīyavāraṃ mudritā Madrasa

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words. Last folio number is given as x.
